General.Name: Tibet GaoZheng Explosive Co Ltd
General.Description: Tibet GaoZheng Explosive Co., Ltd. produces and sells civil explosives in China. The company offers powdered emulsion explosives and emulsion gel explosives; and industrial explosives, industrial detonators, industrial fuses, industrial detonating cord, etc. It also engages in the transportation and distribution of civil explosives, loading and unloading and transportation agency, cargo storage management, vehicle repair and maintenance, etc. as well as provision of blasting services. In addition, the engages in the armed escort and industrial and mining engineering construction businesses. Further, it is involved in engineering and technology research and test development, public safety, and environmental protection monitoring activities; production and sale of mine and special equipment, technical services; and provision of engineering consulting and technical training consulting services. The company's products are used in mining, water conservancy and hydropower, transportation construction, urban transformation, geological exploration, explosive processing, national defense construction, and other fields. Tibet GaoZheng Explosive Co., Ltd. was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Lhasa, China.
